ComicInfo.Title: Settling Dust Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
The heart-wrenching conclusion to Max and Chloeâ€™s epic comics journey!
Max finally believes that she has found a way to cross the timelines and return to the woman she loves, Chloe Price! Features fan favorite characters Steph Gingrich and Victoria Chase from the original game.
